content.rendered:
Thailand is renowned for its robust and reliable mobile internet services, making it convenient for both tourists and conference attendees to stay connected. With widespread 4G and 5G networks, visitors can enjoy high-speed internet across the country, whether in urban areas like Bangkok or remote tourist destinations.

For those attending FOSS4G-Asia 2024, we recommend choosing between two leading service providers in Thailand: AIS and TrueMove H. Both providers offer excellent coverage, competitive rates, and tailored tourist packages to ensure seamless connectivity during your stay.

Recommended Service Providers

  1. AIS Tourist Plans
    AIS offers a variety of tourist SIM packages that cater to short-term visitors. These plans provide high-speed data and are designed to accommodate international travelers with affordable pricing and convenience.

    • Key Benefits: Reliable network coverage, high-speed 5G, easy setup.
      3G/4G/5G Channel : 700/900/1800/2100/2600MHz and 26 GHz.
    • Where to Buy: Available at Suvarnabhumi Airport and Don Mueang Airport.
    • Learn More: AIS Tourist Plans
      Recommend Package:   8 Days Plan | 15GB High Speed |  299 Baht

      TrueMove H Tourist SIM
      TrueMove H offers tourist SIM cards with generous data allowances and affordable rates, perfect for travelers who need dependable internet access throughout Thailand.

      • Key Benefits: Extensive nationwide coverage, fast internet speeds, and attractive packages for tourists. 3G/4G/5G Channel : 700/850/900/1800/2100/2600  MHz
      • Where to Buy: Available at Suvarnabhumi Airport and Don Mueang Airport.
      • Learn More: TrueMove H Tourist SIM
        Recommend package : Thailand Tourist Infinite SIM 8 Days | Unlimited Internet | 449 Baht

Quick Setup at Airports

Both AIS and TrueMove H have dedicated counters at Suvarnabhumi Airport and Don Mueang Airport, where you can easily purchase and activate a tourist SIM upon arrival. The setup is quick and straightforward, ensuring you are connected from the moment you land in Thailand.

Why Choose These Providers?

Both AIS and TrueMove H are widely trusted for their quality of service and extensive network coverage. Whether you’re navigating Bangkok’s urban landscape or visiting rural attractions, these providers offer reliable connectivity, making them ideal for attendees of FOSS4G-Asia 2024.

Stay connected and enjoy your time in Thailand with the best internet services tailored to your needs!
